transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens on behalf of the sender, with allowance.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is given for a spender by an owner.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance for a spender.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance for a spender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given initial supply of tokens.

blacklist.description: Adds an account to the blacklist.

unBlacklist.description: Removes an account from the blacklist.

isBlacklisted.description: Checks if an account is blacklisted.

burn.description: Burns a specific amount of tokens from the caller's balance.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specific amount of tokens from a specified account, reducing the allowance.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified account.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

renounceOwnership.description: Renounces the ownership of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

Blacklisted.description: Emitted when an account is blacklisted.

UnBlacklisted.description: Emitted when an account is removed from the blacklist.

BlacklisterChanged.description: Emitted when the blacklister is updated.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when the ownership of the contract is transferred.
